section.6: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"If the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) wanted to travel quickly, he would delay Zuhr until the time of 'Asr and combine them, and he would delay Maghrib until he combined it with 'Isha' when the twilight had disappeared
